shows.title: The Scribes
shows.desc: Hip hop is all about bling and guns, right? Think again. The Scribes are bringing positive vibes back; they’re a multi-award-winning threesome whose blend of beatboxing, off-the-cuff freestyling and genre-spanning cuts has created an uplifting live show quite unlike any other. And as if that didn’t sound cool enough, they’re also sponsored by ultra-hip eco fashion label THTC.
